segments.text: This position requires a high level of English ability . How is your spoken and written English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have learned English for 10 years , and I have passed College English test level 4 and 6 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What other foreign languages do you speak ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have taught myself Japanese in college , and I can carry on simple conversations in Japanese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a driver's license , and two years of driving experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What special skills do you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am very familiar with Windows operating system .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you got any special training in programming ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but I have taken elective courses in computer in college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a good psychological resilience ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I can work well under pressure .
segments.speaker: S2
